org.apache.struts.webapp.example

Interface Subscription

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MemorySubscription

    public interface Subscription

    A Subscription which is stored, along with the associated User, in a UserDatabase.

    Version:
    $Rev$ $Date$
    Author:
    Craig R. McClanahan
